name: Bar Star Dash
description:
Description
Chase and Artie are back in Bar Star Dash!— a smash hit time management game!
Can you keep up with the happy hour crowd? Do you have an eye for style? Find out as you mix drinks, serve customers, and upgrade your own bar in this dazzling time management game. Be a star while you serve celebrity guests and transform your bar into the area's hottest night spot!

You play as a dynamic brother and sister duo, Artie and Chase, and your objective is to help them to transform their run down establishment into an upscale lounge. Earn valuable points as you mix, serve, and upgrade your way through 50 exciting levels! Use points to hire new staff including bouncers and DJ's, and improve areas of your bar including drink selection, the dance floor, and decor. Up to 16 different customers plus 4 celebrity guests will visit your bar – and you better be sure to impress them all in order to earn the maximum amount of tips!

Bar Star Dash:
•The new Zombies mode adds all new thrills with 15 new zombie infested bar tending levels!
•Continuous play mode and and cute characters
•Learn new drinks and recipes
•Hire staff
•Special celebrity VIPs
•Easy to play, challenging to master!
•Personalize and upgrade your bar
•Leaderboards support
